parameters.query:
SELECT 
  o.id,
  o.order_number,
  o.status,
  o.total,
  o.created_at,
  o.customer_name,
  o.customer_email,
  o.shipping_address,
  oi.product_name,
  oi.quantity,
  oi.price as item_price,
  p.artisan_id
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id
WHERE o.order_number LIKE '%{{ $json.orderNumber }}%'
ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

-- Get artisan's recent orders
SELECT 
  o.id,
  o.order_number,
  o.status,
  o.total,
  o.created_at,
  o.customer_name,
  COUNT(oi.id) as item_count
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id
WHERE p.artisan_id = (SELECT id FROM artisans WHERE telegram_chat_id = '{{ $json.chatId }}' LIMIT 1)
GROUP BY o.id, o.order_number, o.status, o.total, o.created_at, o.customer_name
ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Get artisan statistics
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN o.status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN o.status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(o.created_at) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as today_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM o.created_at) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE) 
           AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM o.created_at) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) 
           THEN o.total ELSE 0 END) as monthly_revenue,
  SUM(o.total) as total_revenue
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id
WHERE p.artisan_id = (SELECT id FROM artisans WHERE telegram_chat_id = '{{ $json.chatId }}' LIMIT 1);
